title: Comparative Companies' Stock Valuation through Financial Metrics and its Social Implications. (arXiv:1909.06332v3 [q-fin.PM] UPDATED)
abstract: Out of the companies, Dolby is the company with the best overall financial and operation health. According to the table that accounted its financial statements for the past three years, Dolby has stable profit margins that generates a revenue in the billions, the only company in ten figures. Corporate competition to gain more patents as old ones expire may mean new jobs created, increased funding for schools, investment in technology or engineering education, and further need for purchase of marketing and salespeople.
context:
Title: Comparative Companies' Stock Valuation through Financial Metrics and its Social Implications. (arXiv:1909.06332v3 [q-fin.PM] UPDATED)
Abstract: Out of the companies, Dolby is the company with the best overall financial and operation health. According to the table that accounted its financial statements for the past three years, Dolby has stable profit margins that generates a revenue in the billions, the only company in ten figures. Corporate competition to gain more patents as old ones expire may mean new jobs created, increased funding for schools, investment in technology or engineering education, and further need for purchase of marketing and salespeople.
translated_title: 通过财务指标对比公司股票估值及其社会意义
translated_abstract: 在各家公司中，杜比公司是财务和运营状况最好的公司。根据过去三年的财务报表，杜比公司具有稳定的利润率，创造了数十亿的收入，是仅有的十位数额的公司。企业竞争争取更多专利，因为旧专利过期可能意味着创造新的就业机会，为学校增加更多资金，投资于技术或工程教育，并进一步需要购买市场销售人才。
tldr: 杜比公司是财务和运营状况最好的公司，其稳定的利润率创造了数十亿的收入。企业竞争争取更多专利可能带来新的就业机会和对教育和市场销售领域的投资需求。
en_tdlr: Dolby is the company with the best overall financial and operation health, generating billions of revenue with stable profit margins. Corporate competition for patents may lead to new job opportunities and investment in education and marketing.
